short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that uses AI to read terms of service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*THIS IN AN ALPHA TEST*


Introducing "Fine Print", a revolutionary browser extension powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence (AI) technology. Fine Print is designed to make your online experience safer and more transparent by analyzing Terms of Service (TOS) agreements on websites.

With the proliferation of online services, understanding and keeping up with the constant updates to TOS agreements can be a daunting task. Many users often find themselves scrolling through lengthy and complex documents without fully grasping the implications of the terms they're agreeing to. That's where Fine Print comes in.

Using state-of-the-art natural language processing algorithms, Fine Print scans and comprehends TOS agreements in real-time. It breaks down the complex legal jargon and provides you with an easily understandable summary of the key points and potential concerns hidden within the document.

With Fine Print, you can regain control over your online interactions by understanding the TOS agreements that govern them. Stay informed, protect your privacy, and make informed decisions about the digital services you choose to engage with. Experience a more transparent online environment with Fine Print.
